name: JacadoLines
summary: JacadoLines is a game in which you should try to move the shapes and place identical shapes together in rows, columns or diagonals of five (or more). When you succeed putting five (or more) shapes together in the same row, column or diagonal these shapes will be removed and you will earn points. With each move that doesn't lead to a new row, column or diagonal of identical shapes three new shapes are placed on the board. The objective of the game is getting the highest score possible.
